message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can adjust from there.
I'll give you a slightly better deal. You can have 40% and I'll take 60%
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than 40%. How about 55% for me and 45% for you?
I'll meet you halfway. 50/50 split. No more negotiations
